name: Virtua Fighter esports
overview: An enhanced remaster of the game, titled Virtua Fighter 5 Ultimate Showdown, also known in Japanese arcades as Virtua Fighter esports, was teased at Tokyo Game Show 2020 Online in September 2020 as Virtua Fighter x esports Project and announced in May 2021, in celebration of Sega's 60th anniversary. Co-developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and Sega AM2, this version features updated graphics, using the Dragon Engine, new background music, new user interface, new opening cinematic, and new online features.
